verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w get|strong="H7069"\w* a \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w bottle|strong="H1228"\w*, and \add take\add* of the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and of the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*;

And go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w east|strong="H2777"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* there the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I shall \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* thee,\f + \fr 19.2 \ft the east…: Heb. the sun gate\f*

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, the which whosoever \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*, his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* shall \w tingle|strong="H6750"\w*.

Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have \w estranged|strong="H5234"\w* this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in it unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, whom neither they nor their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, nor the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w innocents|strong="H5355"\w*;

They have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* also the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, to \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \add for\add* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* not, nor \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, neither \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \add it\add* into my \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*:

Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* shall no more be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, nor The \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, but The \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*.

And I will make \w void|strong="H1238"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; and I will cause them to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and by the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*: and their \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to be \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* for the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and for the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*, and an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*; every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* thereby shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* and \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* because of all the \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* thereof.

And I will cause them to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* in the \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* and \w straitness|strong="H4689"\w*, wherewith their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and they that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, shall \w straiten|strong="H6693"\w* them.
Then shalt thou \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bottle|strong="H1228"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with thee,

And shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Even \w so|strong="H3602"\w* will I \w break|strong="H7665"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, as \add one\add* \w breaketh|strong="H7665"\w* a \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, that \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* be made whole \w again|strong="H7495"\w*: and they shall \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \add them\add* in \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, till \add there be\add* no \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w*.\f + \fr 19.11 \ft be made…: Heb. be healed\f*

Thus will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, and \add even\add* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* as \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*:

And the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, shall be \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* as the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, because of all the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* upon whose \w roofs|strong="H1406"\w* they have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and have poured \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, whither the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him to \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*; and he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and upon all her \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against it, because they have \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w necks|strong="H6203"\w*, that they might not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.
